fields.name: easy
fields.description: Awarded for completing an easy level achievement that promotes using git, and active participation in pull requests and issues.

fields.name: medium
fields.description: Harder to get than easy badges, but no so hard.  These achievements require patience and perservarence.

fields.name: hard
fields.description: These badges recognize achievements that show heavy use and knowledge of git, and active contribution to coding projects.

fields.name: very-hard
fields.description: These badges recognize major contributions to open-source and in-house projects, and wild use of git with full diresgard for your code base.

fields.name: impossible
fields.description: These badges are awarded for wild and crazy horse play.

fields.name: legendary
fields.description: Contributing to the code source, or going above and beyond the call to action.
